title: New Mutants, Vol. 3: Fall of the New Mutants
description: Coming out of Second Coming, the New Mutants who are still left are licking their wounds on a forced R&R trip. While they try and put themselves back together, others are looking to take them apart. A strange secretive military group has an agenda involving Illyana Rasputin. And they don't want to give her a medal.Collecting: New Mutants 15â€“21
author: Zeb Wells
